title: Actually over this bug now
body: If you leave queue as a game is found, it gives you a box saying you can't leave, then once ok is clicked it takes you to the accept/decline section. But, because you left the queue it doesn't register properly, so whether you decline or accept, you get stuck in limbo and can't do anything till you relaunch. If you click accept, and the queue was properly for filled, the people in it get stuck in select and also have to quit (happened to friend)

replies.body: I had this happen to me in a ranked queue, i lost LP...
ikr, it happened and apparently every1 in my game lost lp, because we all "simultaneously" dodged, some random had it then every1 lost lp
Damn i hope that didn't happen to my team, they need to fix this
